content: you should know how to crochet following stitches us terminology chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble / triple crochet decrease double_crochet 2 together fpdc front post double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet crochet level intermediate advanced size bag is about 26 cm / 10 ¼ wide and 26 cm / 10 ¼ tall with the gauge mentioned in this pattern the size will vary with the yarn and hook size used exact gauge is not critical recommended materials ● 260 g / 6 skeins / 650m / 715 yds of scheepjes catona fingering 100% mercerised cotton 50 g / 125 m / 136 7 yds in 402 silver green color ● crochet hook 2 5 mm tapestry needle hand-sewing needle yarn color matching sewing thread ● 2 5 cm / 1 2 metal d-rings and 2 metal snap hooks for attaching a strap ● optional you can make a lining measure the bag before purchasing ● zipper if you like measure your finished bag before purchasing ● decovil heavy or any other interlining for the bottom of the bag approximately 4 cm 1 6 by 23 cm 9 measure the bottom of the finished bag before purchasing
